name: ELI5 (Explain Like I'm Five)

A dataset of long-form QA pairs from the Reddit ELI5 forum, containing complex open-ended questions and multi-paragraph human-written answers.
size: Approximately 270,000 QA pairs; a high-quality subset includes ~30,000.
notes: Collected from Reddit's ELI5 forum, the dataset focuses on open-ended, explanatory questions (often 'Why' or 'How') and long-form human answers. It supports research in generative QA and has been integrated into benchmarks like KILT. Answers are not extractive, and multiple human answers may exist per question.
